price: Kuma dã kanã gani, a lõkacin da aka tsayar da su a kan wuta, sai suka ce: "Yã kaitõnmu! Dã ana mayar da mu, kuma bã zã mu ƙaryata ba daga ãyõyin Ubangijinmu, kuma zã mu kasance Daga mũminai."
arabic: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ وُقِفُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَقَالُواْ يَٰلَيۡتَنَا نُرَدُّ وَلَا نُكَذِّبَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّنَا وَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw tarā idh wuqifū ʿalā al-nāri faqālū yālaytanā nuraddu walā nukadhiba biāyāti rabbinā wanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
